msContents.summary: An agreement of some kind possibly recording a sale of a slave from Flavius Paulos to Theodoros, to whom the document is addressed.

msItemStruct.note: Written transversa charta. Bottom margin ca. 25 cm, top ca. 30 cm and left 3 cm. Written with a brush in big and thick letters.
